summary:
**Summary:**

"The Powerpuff Girls" is an American animated TV show about three young superhero sisters: Blossom, Bubbles, and Buttercup. Created by Craig McCracken, the series follows the girls as they use their superpowers to fight crime in the made-up city of Townsville. Originally called "Whoopass Stew!" as a student film, it was later picked up by Cartoon Network and aired from 1998 to 2005, spanning six seasons and multiple specials. The show was popular and received many award nominations. It has since spawned various spin-offs, including a reboot series.
title: The Powerpuff Girls
